mapper.sql: id, notice_order_number, order_number, shipping_review_order_number, main_order, warehouse_id, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, ower_id, ower_code, ower_name, document_type, order_source_type, external_order_number_first, external_order_number_second, customer_id, customer_code, customer_name, column_one, column_two, all_count, all_height, all_volume, unit, car_barnd, car_model, car_driver, car_relation, operators_id, operators_name, comfirm_id, comfirm_name, tenant_code, remark, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,order_status_type
mapper.update:
UPDATE wms_outbound_shipping_review_info SET is_deleted = 1 ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND shipping_review_order_number IN
#{number}
UPDATE wms_outbound_shipping_review_info SET is_deleted = 1 ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE id = ${id} AND is_deleted = 0
UPDATE wms_outbound_shipping_review_info SET order_status_type = ${statusType} ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE shipping_review_order_number = ${orderNumber} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.select:
SELECT id 'id', notice_order_number 'noticeOrderNumber', order_number 'orderNumber', shipping_review_order_number 'shippingReviewOrderNumber', main_order 'mainOrder', warehouse_id 'warehouseId', warehouse_code 'warehouseCode', warehouse_name 'warehouseName', ower_id 'owerId', ower_code 'owerCode', ower_name 'owerName', document_type 'documentType', order_source_type 'orderSourceType', external_order_number_first 'externalOrderNumberFirst', external_order_number_second 'externalOrderNumberSecond', customer_id 'customerId', customer_code 'customerCode', customer_name 'customerName', column_one 'columnOne', column_two 'columnTwo', all_count 'allCount', all_height 'allHeight', all_volume 'allVolume', unit 'unit', car_barnd 'carBarnd', car_model 'carModel', car_driver 'carDriver', car_relation 'carRelation', operators_id 'operatorsId', operators_name 'operatorsName', comfirm_id 'comfirmId', comfirm_name 'comfirmName', tenant_code 'tenantCode', remark 'remark', is_deleted 'isDeleted', create_by 'createBy', create_time 'createTime', update_by 'updateBy', update_time 'updateTime' FROM wms_outbound_shipping_review_info WHERE is_deleted = 0
AND notice_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{noticeOrderNumber}, '%')
AND order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderNumber}, '%')
AND shipping_review_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shippingReviewOrderNumber}, '%')
AND main_order LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mainOrder}, '%')
AND warehouse_id = #{warehouseId}
AND warehouse_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{warehouseCode}, '%')
AND warehouse_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{warehouseName}, '%')
AND ower_id = #{owerId}
AND ower_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{owerCode}, '%')
AND ower_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{owerName}, '%')
AND document_type = #{documentType}
AND order_source_type = #{orderSourceType}
AND external_order_number_first LIKE CONCAT('%',#{externalOrderNumberFirst}, '%')
AND external_order_number_second LIKE CONCAT('%',#{externalOrderNumberSecond}, '%')
AND customer_id = #{customerId}
AND customer_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{customerCode}, '%')
AND customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{customerName}, '%')
AND column_one LIKE CONCAT('%',#{columnOne}, '%')
AND column_two LIKE CONCAT('%',#{columnTwo}, '%')
AND all_count = #{allCount}
AND all_height = #{allHeight}
AND all_volume = #{allVolume}
AND unit LIKE CONCAT('%',#{unit}, '%')
AND car_barnd LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carBarnd}, '%')
AND car_model LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carModel}, '%')
AND car_driver LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carDriver}, '%')
AND car_relation LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carRelation}, '%')
AND operators_id = #{operatorsId}
AND operators_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{operatorsName}, '%')
AND comfirm_id = #{comfirmId}
AND comfirm_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{comfirmName}, '%')
AND tenant_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{tenantCode}, '%')
AND remark LIKE CONCAT('%',#{remark}, '%')
